containers.array2d



struct Array2D(T);
Fixed size 2D array struct with manually managed memory.

Array2D opCall(uint x, uint y);
Construct a 2D array.

Params:
uint x Width of the array.
uint y Height of the array.

Returns:
2D Array with specified dimensions.

void die();
Destroy the array.

int opApply(int delegate(ref T) dg);
Used by foreach.

T opIndex(uint x, uint y);
Get an element of the array.

Params:
uint x X coordinate of the element to get.
uint y Y coordinate of the element to get.

Returns:
Element at the specified coordinates.

T* ptr(uint x, uint y);
Get a pointer to an element of the array.

Params:
uint x X coordinate of the element to get pointer to.
uint y Y coordinate of the element to get pointer to.

Returns:
Element at the specified coordinates.

void opIndexAssign(T value, uint x, uint y);
Set an element of the array.

Params:
uint x X coordinate of the element to set.
uint y Y coordinate of the element to set.

uint x();
Get width of the array.

uint y();
Get height of the array.
